name: Royal Bank of Canada (RBC)
description: Canada’s largest bank by market capitalization, offering personal, business, wealth management, and capital markets services globally.

name: Toronto-Dominion Bank (TD)
description: One of the largest banks in North America, TD provides retail, commercial, investment, and wholesale banking.

name: Scotiabank
description: A top Canadian bank with a strong international presence, offering retail banking, investment banking, and global capital markets.

name: Bank of Montreal (BMO)
description: Canada’s oldest bank, offering personal, business, wealth management, and investment banking under BMO Capital Markets.

name: Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce (CIBC)
description: One of the Big 5 banks, CIBC offers consumer banking, wealth management, and investment banking through CIBC Capital Markets.

name: National Bank of Canada
description: Headquartered in Montreal, offering retail, corporate, and capital markets banking with strong presence in Quebec.

name: Desjardins Group
description: The largest federation of credit unions in North America, offering retail banking, insurance, and investment services.

name: Laurentian Bank of Canada
description: A Quebec-based bank serving retail, business, and institutional clients across Canada.

name: Canadian Western Bank (CWB)
description: Focused on business banking, equipment financing, and real estate lending.

name: Manulife Bank of Canada
description: A subsidiary of Manulife Financial, offering mortgages, loans, and investment-linked banking solutions.

name: Equitable Bank (EQ Bank)
description: A leading digital-only bank in Canada with high-interest savings, mortgages, and GIC investments.

name: Home Trust Company
description: A trust company specializing in residential mortgages, credit cards, and alternative lending.

name: First National Financial
description: Canada’s largest non-bank mortgage lender with over $100B in mortgages under administration.

name: Community Trust Company
description: Provides mortgage lending, deposit services, and investment products for individuals and businesses.

name: MCAP Mortgage Corporation
description: One of Canada’s largest independent mortgage finance companies, specializing in residential and commercial lending.

name: RBC Capital Markets
description: The investment banking and global markets division of RBC, providing M&A, equity, fixed income, and bond trading.

name: TD Securities
description: The investment banking arm of TD, focusing on capital markets, investment banking, and fixed income/bonds.

name: BMO Capital Markets
description: The investment and corporate banking division of BMO, specializing in equities, bonds, and corporate finance.

name: Scotiabank Global Banking and Markets
description: Scotiabank’s investment banking arm with a focus on fixed income, bonds, commodities, and M&A.

name: CIBC Capital Markets
description: Investment banking and capital markets division of CIBC, offering bond trading, advisory, and equity research.

name: National Bank Financial Markets
description: The investment banking subsidiary of National Bank, specializing in bonds, structured finance, and asset management.

name: Brookfield Asset Management
description: One of the world’s largest alternative investment managers based in Canada, managing real estate, infrastructure, and bonds.

name: CI Financial
description: A Canadian independent wealth and asset management firm with mutual funds, ETFs, and bond portfolios.

name: Fairfax Financial
description: A financial holding company in Canada engaged in insurance, reinsurance, and investment in equities and bonds.
